caption.p: Search Strategy for PubMed and Embase (Via Scopus).

tr.td: (“leptospermum”[MeSH Terms] OR “leptospermum”[All Fields]) OR “leptospermums scoparium”[All Fields]) OR (“manuka”[All Fields] AND “oil”[All Fields])) OR ((“tea tree oil”[MeSH Terms] OR “tea tree oil”[All Fields] NOT (honey) [All Fields])
